mods.abstract: Female adult, China head on cloth body, China forearms & lower limbs, molded & painted features, human hair wig, jointed at shoulders & hips, red satin underwear trimmed with black lace, black satin dress lined with red satin, black lace trimming, two red flowers, black lace veil, silver head-wear, black leather high heel shoes, all, hand-made. Accompanying information describes as Spanish costume doll. The doll is eighty-three years. Her dress is made of black & red satin & black lace. She represents Spanish women who came up Mississippi River to Missouri from New Orleans.
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.
